blog.name: eimik
blog.title: eimik
blog.description: Welcome to my blog! - Cosplay/Drawings/Naruto and Anime stuff - see "about me" for more

summary: I'm back
body:
I’m back

Sooo, I haven’t been posting much lately as I finally had the time to work on my cosplays again and I wanted to use this opportunity. Unfortunately it took most of my free time so I haven’t been doing the other stuff I used to do - post here, draw etc.

But - I occasionally logged into tumblr and I noticed that we can FINALLY befriend Talbott in HPHM so guess who started playing it again and will be spamming with HPHM posts?

Also, working on my cosplays, being active in the cosplay community and talking to friends got me into SO MANY new fandoms, I’m absolutely overwhelmed by all the amazing stuff. Hopefully I’ll have some time to post again because there’s a lot of stuff I want to post now.

summary:
Nobody:  
My brain at 3:59 AM:  Hagrid’s mother was a giantess and his father was a human small enough to sit on one of Hagrid’s...
body:
Nobody:

My brain at 3:59 AM: Hagrid’s mother was a giantess and his father was a human small enough to sit on one of Hagrid’s shoulders when he was eleven. Hagrid makes a point of how tiny he was even for a human. As far as we know humans and giants don’t use fertility aids. Was Hagrid’s conception like throwing a hot dog down a hallway or…?

reblog.comment:

blog.name: my-hogwarts-mystery
blog.title: My Hogwarts Mystery - Megan Fry
blog.description:
Hello everyone, and welcome to My Hogwarts Mystery. My name is Megan Fry and I'm a student at the Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, representing Ravenclaw (and not because blue and black looks great on me). Hopefully you'll all enjoy getting to see everything I get up at Hogwarts and maybe we'll get to meet each other along the way.

(Disclaimer: This Tumblr is not based on real life and none of the events that happened on here ever actually happened, except on the Harry Potter: Hogwarts Mystery App, but can be told in a different content for entertainment. This is mainly just for entertainment purposes and to not be taken too seriously.)

(Warning: Posts on here are likely to contain inappropriate language/phrases.)

summary: What fandoms are you apart of? (music, books, tv shows, whatever :3)
question: What fandoms are you apart of? (music, books, tv shows, whatever :3)
answer:
Nice question!

I really love a lot of things, but I’ll break them into categories so I can list as many that I can think of (at the moment). 

TV Shows: 

- The Good Place 

- Brooklyn 99

- The Umbrella Academy 

- Buffy the Vampire Slayer

- The Vampire Diaries 

Movies:

- Harry Potter 

- Let’s just say anything Disney here

- A lot of Marvel movies

- Interview with the Vampire

- Underworld 

- Buffy 

- The Lost Boys

- Twilight (it’s awful, I know, but 12 y/o me has to indulge)

- Howl’s Moving Castle

- Spirited Away

- Laputa: Castle in the Sky 

(gonna have to end it here, I’ve realised there are far too many to list)


Music:

- Crush

-Jay Park

- Jessi

- CL

- Monsta X

- BTS

- KARD

- Seventeen

- Rihanna

- Billie Eilish

- Post Malone

- Khalid

- ALMA 

- Tove Lo

- Blackbear


Books:

- Now for this category, it’s really hard to say as I enjoy a lot of different books, but since having started being more committed to school, I’ve pretty much given up on reading for fun. 


That’s all I could think of! I hope we share some common interests. :)

blog.name: bitingdownpromo
blog.title: Biting Down
blog.description: The year is 2027. The wizarding community is tearing itself apart as danger lurks around every corner; the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power. Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance?

summary:
the electronics of your heart...
 The year is 2028. After an incendiary article from Rita Skeeter reporting an increase in...
caption:
the electronics of your heart…

The year is 2028. After an incendiary article from Rita Skeeter reporting an increase in squib births, the wizarding world is tossed into chaos concerning the loss of magical heritage. The renegades vow to protect what’s left of magical blood without caring about the damage along the way. More and more wixen go missing, including the Weasleys’ own Dominique. The Ministry fights within itself as Percy Weasley and Hermione Granger battle for the position of Minister of Magic, tearing the fabric holding wizarding society together.

see how fast they fall apart…

Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance? Whether you flee or bite down and take the heat, the next great war is coming and the outcome is up to you. Welcome to Biting Down.

home | plot | rules | wanted connections | character suggestions | application

Our roleplay currently has many canon characters available, such as Victoire Weasley, Freddie Weasley, Louis Weasley, Scorpius Malfoy, and both Scamander twins. We also welcome original characters, with lots of surnames available from canon!
